## Highlighted words differently

/age/a /name/a /setAge/b /setName/b /42/c /'Taylor'/c

```js /age/a /name/a /setAge/b /setName/b /42/c /'Taylor'/c
const [age, setAge] = useState(42);
const [name, setName] = useState('Taylor');
```

`/<div/a /id="true">/b`

```js /<div/a /id="true">/b
<div id="true">
```
